It books profit and also generates cash for compounding of capital for the long term.\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cul\u003e\u003cli\u003eParks excess and profit booked funds into the balancer etf / stock / other instrument to provide diversification and also keep on generating returns on the investment rather than allowing it to lie as credit balance in the ledger without any returns.\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cul\u003e\u003cli\u003eDesigned to provide comparative better returns over a decent period of time.
